name: Qbits
cooked: As follow up, we have just pushed to the repo adding both Groups 1 & 2 and updated PQC manager and added the suited tests. All post-quantum algorithms are checked found ok except only one which is ‘SQIsign’ where we need to discuss (either to keep it or remove it) since it has not yet been standardized by NIST.
topic_title: Implemented Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) Feature into Bitcoin Core!
topic_html_title: Implemented Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) Feature into Bitcoin Core!
raw: As follow up, we have just pushed to the repo adding both Groups 1 & 2 and updated PQC manager and added the suited tests.  All post-quantum algorithms are checked found ok except only one which is 'SQIsign' where we need to discuss (either to keep it or remove it) since it has not yet been standardized by NIST.
